channel.title: Xalion - Updated Frequently
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/xalionlogo-1.png[/img][/center]
[font=georgia][size=16pt][b]Information[/b][/size] • Server Base: Winterlove v.3 • Client Base: 317 loading 377 deob
[size=16pt][b]Update Log:[/b][/size][/font] [code][12/31/11]Bradley: Cycle rate set from 500 to 600. [12/31/11]Bradley: Cleaned most junk out of the source.
[1/1/12]Bradley: Finished packaging - 1st update of 2012! [1/1/12]Bradley: Item stack text colors, water movement, and fire cape movement added to client. [1/1/12]Bradley: Correct walk, stand, and run emotes added. [1/1/12]Bradley: Configured class names. [1/1/12]Bradley: Added idle logout.[/code]
[font=georgia][b]Currently working on:[/b] - Improved packet handling and giving packet types their own classes
[size=16pt][b]Media[/b][/size] - None yet.[/font]
[center]Still working on thread...[/center]

item.title: Xalion - Updated Frequently
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:5, topic:427600”]You sure do like the name Xalion. Good luck. Are you trying to improve Winterlove?[/quote]Thanks. At the moment I don’t really have a set goal, although I probably will get one in the future.

Read full topic
